channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: On the Trail of the Red-Haired Man
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Frederick J. Jackson)
item.description: Van Crom was over the hill, or so Bjorkman said. But could this wily old reporter find Bradford Kerry when even the professional hunters couldn't?
